title: Ageable
description: Adds a timer for the entity to grow up. It can be accelerated by giving the entity the items it likes as defined by feed_items.

fields.description: Length of time before an entity grows up (-1 to always stay a baby)

fields.desciption: List of items that can be fed to an entity to age them up
List of items that are dropped when an entity grows up

fields.title: Grow up event
fields.desciption: Event to fire when an entity grows up
